Background

I'm a full stack web developer with 16 years of development experience and a proven track record of implementing technical solutions and development processes.

My work in manufacturing, government, and insurance have given me a strong background in software architecture, while my experiences in marketing & advertising have developed my front-end skill set.

Most importantly, I'm a team builder who endeavors to increase efficiency and project successes. I believe communication and information sharing are the key traits that differentiate a good team from an excellent one.

Outside of software development, I enjoy spending time outside, reading about philosophy, psychology, and evolutionary biology. I'm also an avid CD collector and if the format ever has a resurgence I'm going to finally be one of the cool kids.

Web Developer

January 2010 - March 2017
Software Developer
Mobile development team lead. Responsible for analysis, design, and development for KEMI's web-based enterprise application serving over 24,000 policyholders and 5400 claimants in 120 Kentucky counties. Worked alongside Quality Assurance analysts to develop test plans and communicate project requirements. Performed code reviews and trained junior developers on existing standards, practices as well as new technologies.

February 2006 - January 2010
Programmer/Analyst
Managed the entire development life cycle of multiple web-based applications vital to the duties of the Kentucky Court System. Architected and built an enterprise help desk issue tracking system that integrated various siloed systems and data stores. Introduced and implemented version control for the software development team.

Software Engineer
